    • Method Detail

      • getWinValue

        public int getWinValue()
        Getter of the client's win value. The win value identifies the client when playing against another player. This value, with range 0-1, is set by the server and is used when the server sends the WINS command to each client.
        Returns:
        the win value

      • setWinValue

        public void setWinValue(int winValue)
        Setter for the win value.
        Parameters:
